name: Craig SAUNDERS, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, State Correctional Institution at Rockview, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 26th day of April, 2017, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

attorneys: Theron Richard Perez, Maria Gerarda Macus, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, 1920 Technology Parkway, Me-chanicsburg, PA 17050, for Appellees.
